title: Congress takes up NSA's data mining allowance
contentencoded:
The House of Representatives votes on an amendment to take away money from the NSA today. It's part of the $500 billion defense spending bill and it's got the tech industry up in arms.

KQED's Aarti Shahani joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 24, 2013
teaser: The House of Representatives votes on an amendment to take away money from the NSA today. It's part of the $500 billion defense spending bill and it's got the tech industry up in arms.
